5. Andreena Bergman

Andreena Bergman
================

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Andreena Bergman - Febraury, 2022 | Andreena Bergman, City Council Position 6 **Phone:** 360-629-2181 **Term:** 2024 to 2027 [Email Andreena Bergman](mailto:andreena.bergman@stanwoodwa.org) Biography Andreena is a native to the area. In her early years she worked at the original Scandia Bakery and Lefse Factory. This forged her passion for baking and the love of the City's Scandinavian roots. She found herself with her family living downtown in the Historical District where she raised her three daughters. She has built a community relationship working at several local restaurants and is currently working at Bertelsen's Winery.  Andreena loves baking, gardening, old cars, traveling, exploring historical sites, spending time with friends and family, especially her grandchildren, and chatting with "Old-timers of Stanwood". Community Involvement Andreena is and has been a member of organizations and non-profits to help build, maintain and cultivate community programs and outreach. She has volunteered with MOPS (Mothers of preschoolers) at Camano Chapel and has served as the hospitality coordinator for several years. She is currently a member and a trustee at Stanwood Area Historical Society and a member of the Sons of Norway. |
